name: Princess
wishText:
Those late-night calls, our endless bakkati, and the way you bring out sides of me I never even knew existedâ€”every moment with you feels like magic. You are my baby, my bestie, my world.

A few years ago, I never imagined Iâ€™d write something like this for anyone, but you changed everything. In the last three years, youâ€™ve shown me what love feels like, and I canâ€™t thank you enough for being the most precious person in my life.

Many birthday wishes are coming your way, but I promise to make each year even more special for you. I can't wait to see you, hold you close, and shower you with endless kisses! ðŸ˜˜ðŸ’•
